sentence: If weÃ¢ÂÂre to believe TuesdayÃ¢ÂÂs headlines, cannabis stocks are getting smoked in an earnings-driven chain reaction.

Market Maker Edge: Given Canopy Growth stockÃ¢ÂÂs fairly steep price volatility and rally off its lows, IÃ¢ÂÂd be hard-pressed to confidently buy shares with a traditional stop-loss.
